#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

struct guest{
	int at, dt;
};

bool cmp(guest a, guest b)
{
	return 	(a.dt<b.dt);
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		guest time[n];
		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
			scanf("%d", &time[i].at);
		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
			scanf("%d", &time[i].dt);
		int cnt, max=-1;
		sort(time, time+n, cmp);
		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
		{
			cnt=1;
			for(int j=i+1; j<n; j++)
				if( time[j].at<time[i].dt )
					cnt++;
			if( cnt>max )
				max = cnt;
		}
		printf("%d \n", max);
		/*sort(time, time+n, cmp);
		int cnt=1, taken=0;
		for(int i=1; i<n; i++)
			if( time[i].at>=time[taken].dt )
			{
				cnt++;
				taken=i;
				//printf("%d %d \n", time[taken].at, time[taken].dt);
			}
		if( cnt==1 )
			printf("%d \n", n);
		else if( cnt==n )
			printf("1 \n");
		else
			printf("%d \n", n-cnt);*/
	}
	return 0;
}
